titles.title: Recognizing veterans who served in the Armed Forces during World War II and supporting the goals and ideals of National World War II Veterans Recognition Week.
Recognizing veterans who served in the Armed Forces during World War II and supporting the goals and ideals of National World War II Veterans Recognition Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Recognizes, remembers, and honors the U.S. veterans of World War II.
Supports the goals and ideals of National World War II Veterans Recognition Week.
